faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.contact_support: Can't find what you're looking for? Contact Support
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about Maestro Habitat

questions.how_create_account: How do I create an account?
questions.how_find_coach: How do I find the right coach for me?
questions.how_book_session: How do I book a session?
questions.can_reschedule: Can I reschedule or cancel a session?
questions.coach_cancels: What happens if a coach cancels?
questions.when_charged: When am I charged for a session?
questions.view_payment_history: How do I view my payment history?
questions.become_coach: How do I become a coach on Maestro Habitat?
questions.set_availability: How do I set my availability?
questions.when_get_paid: When and how do I get paid?
questions.app_not_working: The app isn't working properly. What should I do?
questions.update_profile: How do I update my profile information?

answers.how_create_account: To create an account, tap 'Sign Up' on the login screen. You can register using your email address or sign in with Google. Choose whether you want to join as a Parent/Student (to find coaches) or as a Coach/Coach (to offer your services).
answers.how_find_coach: Use the search feature to browse coaches by category, subject, or name. You can filter by availability, price range, and modality (online/in-person). Each coach profile includes their bio, ratings, reviews, and areas of expertise.
answers.is_info_secure: Yes! We take data security seriously. Your personal information is encrypted and stored securely. We never share your data with third parties without your consent. Review our Privacy Policy for more details.
answers.how_book_session: Find a coach you like, view their profile, and tap 'Book Session'. Select an available time slot from their calendar, confirm the session duration and type, then proceed to payment. You'll receive a confirmation once the booking is complete.
answers.can_reschedule: Yes, you can reschedule or cancel sessions from the 'My Bookings' section. Please note that cancellation policies vary by coach - check the coach's profile for their specific policy. Generally, cancellations made 24+ hours in advance are fully refundable.
answers.coach_cancels: If a coach cancels a session, you'll be automatically notified and receive a full refund. You can then rebook with the same coach or find another one. Coaches who cancel frequently may have their accounts reviewed.
answers.payment_methods: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express) and debit cards. In some regions, we also support Apple Pay and Google Pay. All payments are processed securely through our payment provider.
answers.when_charged: You're charged when you book a session. The payment is held securely and released to the coach after the session is completed. If you cancel within the allowed timeframe, you'll receive a full refund.
answers.view_payment_history: Go to Account > Reports to view your complete payment history, download invoices, and see upcoming charges. You can filter by date range and export reports as PDF.
answers.become_coach: From your Parent account, go to Account > 'Become a Coach' to start the onboarding process. You'll need to create a new account with a different email address, complete your profile, set your availability and pricing, and submit for review.
answers.set_availability: Go to the Calendar tab in your coach dashboard. You can set recurring weekly availability (e.g., Mon-Fri 9am-5pm) and block off specific dates for vacations or time off. Your availability updates in real-time for clients.
answers.when_get_paid: Payments are processed weekly for all completed sessions. Set up your payout method in Account > Billing. You can choose direct deposit to your bank account. Payment processing typically takes 2-3 business days.
answers.app_not_working: Try these steps: 1) Close and reopen the app, 2) Check your internet connection, 3) Update to the latest version from the App Store, 4) Log out and log back in. If issues persist, contact us through Account > Contact Us.
answers.update_profile: Go to Account > Edit Profile to update your name, email, profile picture, and other details. For coaches, additional profile settings are available in the Settings tab of your coach dashboard.
answers.contact_support: You can reach our support team through Account > Contact Us. Fill out the form with your question and we'll respond within 24-48 hours. For urgent issues, please include 'URGENT' in the subject line.

consumer.question: How do I book a session?
consumer.answer: Browse our coaches, select one that matches your needs, choose an available time slot, and complete the booking.

consumer.question: What is the cancellation policy?
consumer.answer: You can cancel up to 24 hours before the scheduled time for a full refund.

consumer.question: What payment methods are accepted?
consumer.answer: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and other digital payment methods.

provider.question: How do I become a coach?
provider.answer: Click 'Become a Coach' in your profile and complete the application form.

provider.question: How do I get paid?
provider.answer: Payments are processed weekly to your linked payment account.
